name: Motherboard (1ightningstorm, Kkhav, aisrosel, Julien Mulard)
description:
Escape an abandoned laboratory with the help of a lonely robot...

Help Prim and Aye escape the broken down lab as they solve puzzles, get upgrades, and learn to understand each other's wants and needs.

Motherboard was created for Wowie Jam #4 2022

Playing in fullscreen is recommended
